title: Collaborative Learning Design Utilizing Laptops in 1:1 Classroom Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Designing collaborative language learning activities in a BYOD (bring-your-own-device) laptop environment. Conducting project-based learning utilizing diverse group formations (1:1, 1:2, 2:2)

learning_goals: Complete language tasks through laptop-based collaborative activities in various group configurations (1:1, 1:2, 2:2)
Perform real-time peer feedback and collaborative document editing using digital tools
Creatively resolve technical and collaborative issues arising in 1:1 classroom environments

resources: Google Workspace (Docs, Slides), Collaborative Platforms (Miro, Padlet)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
